name: Return (TimeData)
description:
The world's end is near...
Dio destroyed the world, and nothing seems to be able to stop him, when three heroes from another world are transported here as the last hope of the world. Can they change fate and defeat the Void's Lord ?

Programmer - Erwan Sénéchal

Art & Design - William Goguillon

Special thanks - Maxime Herbin, Lucas Vignot
